settings.title: Cover Letter Plan - $30 AUD/month
settings.content:
Stay prepared for every opportunity with our Cover Letter Plan. For just $30 AUD per month, you’ll receive a professionally tailored cover letter for each new job application. Whether you’re applying for multiple jobs or just want a fresh, personalised cover letter for each opportunity, this plan ensures you always make a strong first impression.

Your subscription includes up to 5 personalised cover letters per month.

settings.title: Job Seeker Pro Plan - $75 AUD/month
settings.content:
Gain full support in your job search with the Job Seeker Pro Plan. Each month, you’ll receive a custom resume update, a new cover letter tailored to your next job application, and LinkedIn profile adjustments to keep your profile fresh and relevant. Ideal for those actively applying and looking to keep their job application materials up to date.

Your subscription includes 1 resume update, 2 personalised cover letters, and 1 LinkedIn profile optimisation per month.
